BitVariable.Name: Regular Control
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the firmware is in control

BitVariable.Name: Integral Control
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the device is under Integral control

BitVariable.Name: Is Moving
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the actuator is moving

BitVariable.Name: Jiggle On
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the jiggle test is in progress

BitVariable.Name: Overshoot Present
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the overshoot is in progress\n Parameter is excluded. Always returns TRUE.

BitVariable.Name: Pressure Limit-
BitVariable.Description: If 1, main pressure is at Fill limit

BitVariable.Name: Pressure Limit+
BitVariable.Description: If 1, main pressure is at Exhaust limit

BitVariable.Name: Tight Shutoff
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the system is in the state of Tight shutoff

BitVariable.Name: IP Current
BitVariable.Description: If 1, I/P current is zero AND PWM>high limit

BitVariable.Name: Actuator Limit
BitVariable.Description: If 1, Integral windup to limit (of actuator pressure)

BitVariable.Name: Overshoots > 0
BitVariable.Description: If 1, number of overshoots occurred is 1 or more

BitVariable.Name: Jiggles > 0
BitVariable.Description: If 1, number of jiggle tests occurred is 1 or more

BitVariable.Name: At Limit
BitVariable.Description: If 1, any air pressure is at limit

BitVariable.Name: Exhausting
BitVariable.Description: If 1, air is exhausting

BitVariable.Name: Startup
BitVariable.Description: If 1, the system is in startup state

BitVariable.Name: Air Low
BitVariable.Description: If 1, air is at low limit

BitVariable.Name: Count Limit-
BitVariable.Description: If 1, I/P or Bias is at upper limit

BitVariable.Name: Count Limit+
BitVariable.Description: If 1, I/P or Bias is at lower limit

BitVariable.Name: Pilot Limit-
BitVariable.Description: If 1, pilot pressure is at Fill limit

BitVariable.Name: Pilot Limit+
BitVariable.Description: If 1, pilot pressure is at Exhaust limit
